Headline: #87 87 Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: Eastbound #87 87 buses are temp. rerouted via 87th, Halsted, 83rd, Lafayette, then resume their normal route on 87th due to street blockage near 87th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87 buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Halsted, 83rd, Lafayette, then resume their normal route on 87th due to street blockage near 87th/Eggleston.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
